participant_1.name: Dr. Alice Thompson
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and ambitious, always striving for the best for herself and her daughter.
participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. i enjoy going to the park. i'm now looking for a new job.

participant_2.name: Luna Spark
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and playful, with a touch of loneliness that makes her yearn for friendship.
participant_2.background: i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i am very lonely. i live in the cloud. i like to make time stop.
